info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hillsdale County through 345 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reading, or 10 miles south of Hillsdale, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hillsdale and Jonesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
